cn.campusapp.pan.autorender

Interface AutoRender

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ViewModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoRenderViewModel

    public interface AutoRender
extends ViewModel
    Trigger render on shown, which means these cases:

    1. Activity.onResume 2. Fragment.onResume 3. Fragment.setUserVisibleHint(true) Created by nius on 7/29/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadDataQuickly()
      获取最新的数据，以用来自动更新 注意，该方法必须同步返回，不可发起异步请求 render方法紧随其后被调用
      boolean shouldRenderOnTrigger() 

      • Methods inherited from interface cn.campusapp.pan.ViewModel

        getRootView, render

    • Method Detail

      • loadDataQuickly

        void loadDataQuickly()
        获取最新的数据，以用来自动更新 注意，该方法必须同步返回，不可发起异步请求 render方法紧随其后被调用

      • shouldRenderOnTrigger

        boolean shouldRenderOnTrigger()
        Returns:
        false if DO NOT render in any cases
